item.title: First Post
item.description: hello wolrd! 1 2 3 4 iptables -t nat -A PREROUTING -p tcp --dport [端口号] -j DNAT --to-destination [目标IP] iptables -t nat -A PREROUTING -p udp --dport [端口号] -j DNAT --to-destination [目标IP] iptables -t nat -A POSTROUTING -p tcp -d [目标IP] --dport [端口号]
